profile_text:
Fred Z.
- Height 6'2
- Weight 273
- age 63, born 3/18/1961
- controlled hypertension with meds at 130/90
- lifelong history of at best intermittent exercise
- father had colon cancer at 81. sister had uterine cancer at 55 and has genetic mutation increasing vulnerability. mom has had multiple treated melanomas.
- Developing pain on right and left front outside feet.  Localized, burning feeling, not very intense yet.
- Had calcium artery test, score was zero.
